column4: in my office i use the LAN here and it is on dhcp too, but still i cant surf the internet but other windows computers can surf the internet on my network dont really know what is wrong here. i can ping the router but cant ping external addresses like eg. www.google.com, www.yahoo.com what can i do please...
funny enuf i am the net admin
check your firewall settings, f.e. by firestarter
